meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to a fern.
meanings.sent1: The fabric was soft and fernlike to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a peaceful, fernlike atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The fernlike behavior of the cat, napping in the sun, was quite endearing.
meanings.sent4: His movements were slow and deliberate, almost fernlike in their grace.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with fernlike motifs, bringing a touch of nature indoors.
